text: Kuznetsy () is a rural locality (a village) in Petropavlovskoye Rural Settlement, Bolshesosnovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 9 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 7 km west from Petropavlovsk. == References == Category:Rural localities in Bolshesosnovsky District
title: Kuznetsy
